text: Tyla Hepi (born 15 June 1993) is a New Zealand professional rugby league footballer who plays as a for the Castleford Tigers in the Betfred Super League. Hepi previously played for Hull Kingston Rovers, Gloucestershire All Golds and Whitehaven in the UK, Toulouse Olympique in the Betfred Championship and the Wyong Roos in the NSW Cup. and in the Auckland Rugby League competition for the Point Chevalier Pirates. Tyla is the son of coach and former player Brad Hepi. ==References== ==External links== *Toulouse Olympique profile *Wyong Roos profile Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby league second-rows Category:Gloucestershire All Golds players Category:Hull Kingston Rovers players Category:Whitehaven R.L.F.C. players Category:Wyong Roos players Category:Toulouse Olympique players Category:Point Chevalier Pirates players Category:New Zealand rugby league players
title: Tyla Hepi
